plot: An unforgettable urban skiing adventure to the Murmansk Oblast in Russia. This remote corner of Russia is just a five hour drive away from our home but feels much more distant.
title: Nipwitz: Russia
plot_es: An unforgettable urban skiing adventure to the Murmansk Oblast in Russia. This remote corner of Russia is just a five hour drive away from our home but feels much more distant.
